title: (Fanart) In celebration of Gangplank's Rework, I did a little quick something...

embed.description: Spur of the moment piece in celebration of GP's rework~ ;3

body:
{{champion:41}} always has, and always will be my favorite champion in game. So, I did this.

Not much else I can say.

So, yeah.

Thoughts? If any? I did this rather quickly so I'm expecting people to notice mistakes. <: )

replies.body: I like it!  You've done pretty well with the lighting from the glowing hot sword, too!  Well done :D
you forgot to add oranges to the picture
S**t you're right, well that's MY WHOLE DAY RUINED, GAWD.
**YEAH YOU DRAW THEM STICK FIGURES, DONT LET ANYONE TELL YOU OTHERWISE, BELIEVE IN THE YOU THAT BELIEVES IN ME THAT BELIEVES IN YOU! >:OOOOOOOOOOOOO**

Can we please let that show die?
Before it gives us another skin?
(>_>)

Damn, you got a Rioter up here, good job!!
Nice colour palette as well!
What program did u use to make this? :o it looks amazing!! ^.^
Aww thank you, I used Manga Studio 5 to do it. It's not quite as fancy as say photoshop, but for a guy like me who is on a budget, it's perfect.
thats awesome and im so hyped for this gp change it looks awesome

IKR? It looks so hella rad. He looks so much better now rather than just 'generic pirate'. And his updated kit looks fantastic. (The changes to all his spells look so much better, especially his ultimate.)

I look forward to tryin' out his powder kegs too, looks like a really interesting ability.

And maybe, just MAYBE, my regular pre-mades wont **LOATH ME** for picking gangplank anymore. xD
